import React from "react"; const Personas = () => { return (

Personas and Storyboarding

Interface:

Projection Console

After attending classes at Brown and likely most other colleges, you may have likely been projected a presentation or video for class. Almost all classrooms at Brown have projecting capabilities that is controlled through this projection console. It helps to consolidate all the buttons required in the classroom into one interface. Did you know that you can control the room's lights, shades, and even audio from the same interface? This website's goal is to explore and analyze the structure of the interface. We will analyze the Projection interface in the context of its possible users.

Potential Guiding Questions Involving Interfaces:

  • Did you find the process of doing this task straightforward or complicated? Can you elaborate on your thought process?
  • Could you craft an idea of what you should do next at each step? And could you find how to pursue this idea?
  • Did you expect things to go the way at each step? Did you think that something else would happen when you did a certain thing?
  • Was there any prior familiarity with an interface that helped you accomplish the task/Is there a similar process that this reminds of?
  • Can you describe your overall experience with this interface?

); }; export default Personas;
